Package it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.javafx

Class JavaFXJBudgetController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.javafx.JavaFXJBudgetController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JavaFXController
    public class JavaFXJBudgetController
extends java.lang.Object
implements JavaFXController
    This class implements the interfaces JavaFXController and has the responsibility to manage the main window of the application as well as to let visualize all data of the application in tables. Provides specific buttons for each functionality of the application.
    Author:
    Tommaso Catervi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_ASK_EXIT_CONFIRMATION
      The string confirmation message for trying to exit the app.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_EMPTY_ACCOUNT_LIST
      The string error message for trying to remove or modify an Account or create a Transaction without having any Account in the account list.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_EMPTY_TAG_LIST
      The string error message for trying to remove or modify a Tag without having any Tag in the tag list.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_EMPTY_TRANSACTION_LIST
      The string error message for trying to remove a Transaction without having any Transaction in the transaction list.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_NOT_SAVED
      The string confirmation message for trying to reset the ledger or exit the app without having saved data.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_NULL_DEFAULT_PATH
      The string error message for not selecting any default path in the app settings.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_WRONG_PATH
      The string error message for not selecting a valid directory when a directory chooser dialog is being opened.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      JavaFXJBudgetController()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addTransactionAction()
      Starts the JavaFXTransactionCreator class for the creation of a new Transaction as long as the accounts list is not empty.
      void askAlwaysPathAction()
      Disable the selection of the default path for the data storage.
      void createAccountAction()
      Starts the JavaFXAccountCreatorController class for the creation of a new Account.
      void createTagAction()
      Starts the JavaFXTagCreator class for the creation of a new Tag.
      void deleteAccountAction()
      Starts the JavaFXAccountRemover class for the removal of an already existing Account as long as the accounts list is not empty.
      void deleteTagAction()
      Starts the JavaFXTagRemover class for the removal of an already existing Tag as long as the tags list is not empty.
      void deleteTransactionAction()
      Starts the JavaFXTransactionRemover class for the removal of an already existing Transaction as long as the transactions list is not empty.
      void exitFromAppAction()
      Allows to exit the application after asking confirmation.
      void exportAction()
      Allows to save all data of the application to a default path or a chosen path depending on what the user chose.
      void handleRowSelect()
      Gets the selected Transaction from the transactions table and refreshes the movements table beside with the list of the movements associated with the selected transaction.
      void importAction()
      Allows to import data into the application from a chosen path.
      void modifyAccountAction()
      Starts the JavaFXAccountModifierController class for the modification of a Account.
      void modifyTagAction()
      Starts the JavaFXTagModifierController class for the modification of a Tag.
      void resetLedger()
      Allows to reset all data of the application after asking confirmation.
      void setDefaultPath()
      Allows to set the default path for the data storage.
      void showAboutAction()
      Shows the "About" window with the info about the app.
      void useDefaultPathAction()
      Enable the selection of the default path for the data storage.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from interface it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.javafx.JavaFXController

        close, createConfirmationAlert, createErrorAlert, startWindow

                     throws java.io.IOException

        Disable the selection of the default path for the data storage.

        Enable the selection of the default path for the data storage.

      • createAccountAction

        public void createAccountAction()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the JavaFXAccountCreatorController class for the creation of a new Account. When the process finishes, it refreshes all the tables.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • modifyAccountAction

        public void modifyAccountAction()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the JavaFXAccountModifierController class for the modification of a Account. When the process finishes, it refreshes all the tables.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • deleteAccountAction

        public void deleteAccountAction()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the JavaFXAccountRemover class for the removal of an already existing Account as long as the accounts list is not empty. When the process finishes, it refreshes all the tables.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • createTagAction

        public void createTagAction()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the JavaFXTagCreator class for the creation of a new Tag. When the process finishes, it refreshes all the tables.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • modifyTagAction

        public void modifyTagAction()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the JavaFXTagModifierController class for the modification of a Tag. When the process finishes, it refreshes all the tables.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • deleteTagAction

        public void deleteTagAction()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the JavaFXTagRemover class for the removal of an already existing Tag as long as the tags list is not empty. When the process finishes, it refreshes all the tables.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • addTransactionAction

        public void addTransactionAction()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the JavaFXTransactionCreator class for the creation of a new Transaction as long as the accounts list is not empty. When the process finishes, it refreshes all the tables.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • deleteTransactionAction

        public void deleteTransactionAction()
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the JavaFXTransactionRemover class for the removal of an already existing Transaction as long as the transactions list is not empty. When the process finishes, it refreshes all the tables.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • handleRowSelect

        public void handleRowSelect()
        Gets the selected Transaction from the transactions table and refreshes the movements table beside with the list of the movements associated with the selected transaction.
